mapper.select: select SID, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, KEYWORDID, KEYWORD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, EBAYITEMID, UPDATETIME, CREATETIME, EBAYSORT, KEYWORDFLAG, CATEGORYFLAG, SHOPFLAG, KEYWORDTOTAL, CATEGORYTOTAL, SHOPTOTAL, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, FIRSTDOWNTIME, ITEMFLAG from DB_RESULTDETAIL where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
